name: Tessarea Vaitogi Inn

reviews.text: Definitely a warm and inviting place to stay. Owned by a wonderful Samoan couple, this place is a great spot to just relax at and kick your sandals off at the end of the day.
reviews.title: Cute and Charming, Beautiful Surroundings

reviews.text: They have a nice pool area that the kids can really enjoy and the place is located close to plenty of great scenic spots. It is actually in the same village where the legendary Turtle and Shark appear. If you have a chance to see that please go. It is one of the most amazing things you will ever experience.
reviews.title: Unimpressive, yet quiet

aka: Tessarea Vaitogi Inn American Samoa/Pago Pago
